bill_title: revise the compensation for an improvement district board member.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to revise the compensation for an improvement district board member. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 7-25A-17 be AMENDED: 7-25A-17. Each member of the board of supervisors shall receive an amount not to exceed one two hundred dollars per month or an amount established by the electors at referendum. In addition, each supervisor shall receive travel and per diem expenses as set by the board.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
